inicio.descripcion: Greetings from the kingdom of code! I am a software development enthusiast with the ability to turn lines of code into digital masterpieces. I navigate the vast ocean of technology, armed with a keyboard and an endless cup of coffee. My superpower is transforming ideas into modern web applications with a magic touch.

sobre-mi.primero-parrafo: Passionate web developer with +4 years of experience and a solid track record in various sectors, fusing my creativity and technology. My commitment lies in implementing current development best practices to create impactful web experiences. Focused on overcoming challenges and continually learning, I am dedicated to building high-quality web solutions that not only meet, but exceed my clients' expectations.
sobre-mi.segundo-parrafo: Throughout my professional career I have acquired knowledge in various technologies such as Typescript, Javascript, Angular, React, Angular Material, Bootstrap and Rxjs.
sobre-mi.tercer-parrafo: I have a professional degree in computer systems engineering from the Autonomous University of Cauca as well as certifications on web development and responsive design in Platzi and Udemy
